remarks: The singletons resulting by cyclically shifting a given word of length being a prime number and not consisting of identical symbols is a disjoint collection.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-May-2018.)  (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Jun-2018.)
statement:
cshwshash.0 $e |- ( ph -> ( W e. Word V /\ ( # ` W ) e. Prime ) ) $.
cshwsdisj $p |- ( ( ph /\ E. i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ( W ` i ) =/= ( W ` 0 ) ) -> Disj_ n e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) { ( W cyclShift n ) } ) $.
$d V i $.
$d W i n $.
$d i n ph $.
